atk-abh03a45:2_1: Idāni tesaññeva mūlayamake desitānaṁ kusalādidhammānaṁ labbhamānavasena ekadesaṁ saṅgaṇhitvā saccayamakānantaraṁ desitassa saṅkhārayamakassa vaṇṇanā hoti.
atk-abh03a45:2_2: Tatthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva paṇṇattivārādayo tayo mahāvārā, antaravārādayo ca avasesapabhedā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a45:2_3: Ayaṁ panettha viseso – paṇṇattivāre tāva yathā heṭṭhā khandhādayo dhamme uddisitvā ‘‘rūpaṁ rūpakkhandho; cakkhu cakkhāyatanaṁ; cakkhu cakkhudhātu;
atk-abh03a45:2_5: Tathā anārabhitvā ‘‘assāsapassāsā kāyasaṅkhāro’’ti paṭhamaṁ tayopi saṅkhārā vibhajitvā dassitā.
atk-abh03a45:3_1: ‘‘Assāsapassāsā kāyikā, ete dhammā kāyappaṭibaddhā’’ti (ma. ni. 1.463; saṁ. ni.
atk-abh03a45:3_2: 4.348 atthato samānaṁ) hi vacanato kāraṇabhūtassa karajakāyassa phalabhūto eva saṅkhāroti kāyasaṅkhāro.
atk-abh03a45:3_3: Aparo nayo – saṅkhariyatīti saṅkhāro. Kena saṅkhariyatīti? Kāyena.
atk-abh03a45:3_4: Ayañhi vāto viya bhastāya karajakāyena saṅkhariyatīti.
atk-abh03a45:3_7: ‘‘Pubbeva kho, āvuso visākha, vitakketvā vicāretvā pacchā vācaṁ bhindati, tasmā vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhāro’’ti (ma. ni. 1.463; saṁ. ni.
atk-abh03a45:3_8: 4.348) vacanato pana saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro. Kiṁ saṅkharoti? Vaciṁ.
atk-abh03a45:3_11: ‘‘Saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā ete dhammā cittapaṭibaddhā’’ti (ma. ni. 1.463; saṁ. ni.
atk-abh03a45:3_12: 4.348) vacanatoyeva pana tatiyapadepi saṅkhariyatīti saṅkhāro. Kena saṅkhariyati? Cittena.
atk-abh03a45:3_13: Karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṁ katvā cittassa saṅkhāroti cittasaṅkhāro.
atk-abh03a45:3_15: Vitakkavicārānaṁ pana vacīsaṅkhārabhāvena visuṁ gahitattā ‘‘ṭhapetvā vitakkavicāre’’ti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:4_2: Tassa anulomanaye tīṇi, paṭilomanaye tīṇīti cha yamakāni.
atk-abh03a45:4_3: Padasodhanamūlacakkavāre ekekasaṅkhāramūlakāni dve dve katvā anulomanaye cha, paṭilomanaye chāti dvādasa yamakāni.
atk-abh03a45:4_4: Suddhasaṅkhāravāre pana yathā suddhakhandhavārādīsu ‘‘rūpaṁ khandho, khandhā rūpaṁ;
atk-abh03a45:4_5: cakkhu āyatanaṁ, āyatanā cakkhū’’tiādinā nayena yamakāni vuttāni.
atk-abh03a45:4_6: Evaṁ ‘‘kāyo saṅkhāro, saṅkhārā kāyo’’ti avatvā ‘‘kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro, vacīsaṅkhāro kāyasaṅkhāro’’tiādinā nayena kāyasaṅkhāramūlakāni dve, vacīsaṅkhāramūlakaṁ ekanti anulome tīṇi, paṭilome tīṇīti sabbānipi suddhikavāre cha yamakāni vuttāni. Kiṁ kāraṇā?
atk-abh03a45:4_8: Yathā hi khandhayamakādīsu rūpādivisiṭṭhānaṁ khandhānaṁ cakkhādivisiṭṭhānañca āyatanādīnaṁ adhippetattā ‘‘rūpaṁ khandho , khandhā rūpaṁ, cakkhu āyatanaṁ, āyatanā cakkhū’’ti suddhikaekekapadavasena attho atthi.
atk-abh03a45:4_10: Kāyasaṅkhāroti pana dvīhipi padehi ekova attho labbhati.
atk-abh03a45:4_11: Assāso vā passāso vāti suddhikaekekapadavasena atthābhāvato ‘‘kāyo saṅkhāro, saṅkhārā kāyo’’ti na vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:4_13: Tampi kāyavacīcittapadehi idha adhippetānaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ aggahitattā na yujjati. Suddhasaṅkhāravāro hesa.
atk-abh03a45:4_14: Padasodhane pana vināpi atthena vacanaṁ yujjatīti tattha so nayo gahitova.
atk-abh03a45:4_15: Idha pana kāyasaṅkhārassa vacīsaṅkhārādīhi, vacīsaṅkhārassa ca cittasaṅkhārādīhi, cittasaṅkhārassa ca kāyasaṅkhārādīhi, aññattā ‘‘kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro, vacīsaṅkhāro, kāyasaṅkhāro’’ti ekekasaṅkhāramūlakāni dve dve katvā cha yamakāni yujjanti.
atk-abh03a45:4_17: Tasmā tāneva dassetuṁ anulomanaye tīṇi, paṭilomanaye tīṇīti cha yamakāni vuttāni.
atk-abh03a45:5_1: Niddesavāre panassa anulome tāva yasmā na kāyādayova kāyasaṅkhārādīnaṁ nāmaṁ, tasmā noti paṭisedho kato.
atk-abh03a45:5_2: Paṭilome na kāyo na kāyasaṅkhāroti yo na kāyo so kāyasaṅkhāropi na hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a45:5_3: Kāyasaṅkhāro na kāyo kāyasaṅkhāroti kāyasaṅkhāro kāyo na hoti, kāyasaṅkhāroyeva panesoti attho.
atk-abh03a45:5_5: Kāyasaṅkhāravinimuttaṁ pana sesaṁ sabbampi saṅkhatāsaṅkhatapaṇṇattibhedaṁ dhammajātaṁ neva kāyo, na kāyasaṅkhāroti iminā upāyena sabbavissajjanesu attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a45:8_1: Pavattivāre panettha paccuppannakāle puggalavārassa anulomanaye ‘‘yassa kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjati, tassa vacīsaṅkhāro uppajjatī’’ti kāyasaṅkhāramūlakāni dve, vacīsaṅkhāramūlakaṁ ekanti tīṇeva yamakāni labbhanti; tāni gahitāneva.
atk-abh03a45:8_3: Evamettha sabbavāresu tiṇṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ yamakānaṁ vasena yamakagaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a45:9_0: Atthavinicchaye panettha idaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ – imasmiñhi saṅkhārayamake ‘‘assāsapassāsānaṁ uppādakkhaṇe vitakkavicārānaṁ uppādakkhaṇe’’tiādivacanato paccuppannādikālabhedo pavattivasenāpi gahetabbo, na cutipaṭisandhivaseneva.
atk-abh03a45:9_1: ‘‘Dutiyajjhāne tatiyajjhāne tattha kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjatī’’tiādivacanato ca jhānampi okāsavasena gahitanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:9_2: Evamettha yaṁ yaṁ labbhati, tassa tassa vasena atthavinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a45:10_0: Tatridaṁ nayamukhaṁ – vinā vitakkavicārehīti dutiyatatiyajjhānavasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:10_5: Vinā assāsapassāsehīti rūpārūpabhavesu nibbattasattānaṁ vitakkavicāruppattiṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:11_1: Aṅgamattavasena cettha paṭhamajjhānaṁ gahetabbaṁ, na appanāvaseneva.
atk-abh03a45:11_2: Anappanāpattepi hi savitakkasavicāracitte idaṁ saṅkhāradvayaṁ uppajjateva.
atk-abh03a45:12_1: Uppajjamānameva hi cittaṁ rūpaṁ vā arūpaṁ vā samuṭṭhāpeti, na bhijjamānaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:13_0: 37.Suddhāvāsānaṁ dutiye citte vattamāneti paṭisandhito dutiye bhavaṅgacitte.
atk-abh03a45:13_1: Kāmañcetaṁ paṭisandhicittepi vattamāne tesaṁ tattha nuppajjittheva.
atk-abh03a45:13_2: Yāva pana abbokiṇṇaṁ vipākacittaṁ vattati, tāva nuppajjittheva nāmāti dassanatthametaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:13_3: Yassa vā jhānassa vipākacittena te nibbattā, taṁ satasopi sahassasopi uppajjamānaṁ paṭhamacittameva.
atk-abh03a45:13_4: Vipākacittena pana visadisaṁ bhavanikantiyā āvajjanacittaṁ dutiyacittaṁ nāma.
atk-abh03a45:14_1: Avitakkaavicāraṁ pacchimacittanti rūpāvacarānaṁ dutiyajjhānikādicuticittavasena, arūpāvacarānañca catutthajjhānikacuticittavasenetaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:15_0: 79.Yassa kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhati, tassa cittasaṅkhāro nirujjhatīti ettha niyamato kāyasaṅkhārassa cittasaṅkhārena saddhiṁ ekakkhaṇe nirujjhanato āmantāti paṭivacanaṁ dinnaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:15_1: Na cittasaṅkhārassa kāyasaṅkhārena saddhiṁ. Kiṁ kāraṇā?
atk-abh03a45:15_2: Cittasaṅkhāro hi kāyasaṅkhārena vināpi uppajjati ca nirujjhati ca.
atk-abh03a45:15_4: Cittasamuṭṭhānarūpañca cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppajjitvā yāva aññāni soḷasacittāni uppajjanti, tāva tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh03a45:15_5: Tesaṁ soḷasannaṁ sabbapacchimena saddhiṁ nirujjhatīti yena cittena saddhiṁ uppajjati, tato paṭṭhāya sattarasamena saddhiṁ nirujjhati.
atk-abh03a45:15_6: Na kassaci cittassa uppādakkhaṇe vā ṭhitikkhaṇe vā nirujjhati, nāpi ṭhitikkhaṇe vā bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā uppajjati.
atk-abh03a45:15_7: Esā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa dhammatāti niyamato cittasaṅkhārena saddhiṁ ekakkhaṇe nirujjhanato āmantāti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:15_8: Yaṁ pana vibhaṅgappakaraṇassa sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ sattarasamassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirujjhatī’’ti vuttaṁ, taṁ imāya pāḷiyā virūjjhati.
atk-abh03a45:15_9: Aṭṭhakathāto ca pāḷiyeva balavatarāti pāḷiyaṁ vuttameva pamāṇaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:16_0: 128.Yassa kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjati, tassa vacīsaṅkhāro nirujjhatīti ettha yasmā kāyasaṅkhāro cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppajjati, na ca tasmiṁ khaṇe vitakkavicārā nirujjhanti, tasmā noti paṭisedho katoti.
atk-abh03a45:16_1: Iminā nayamukhena sabbattha atthavinicchayo veditabbo. Pariññāvāro pākatikoyevāti.
